snippet: The festival opens on Sept. 14 in the Institute's newly renovated Florence Gould Hall with a concert by Bill Frisell, a guitarist and composer, uniting his 858 Quartet and Beautiful Dreamers trio.
abstract: The festival opens on Sept. 14 in the Institute's newly renovated Florence Gould Hall with a concert by Bill Frisell, a guitarist and composer, uniting his 858 Quartet and Beautiful Dreamers trio.

headline.main: 'Crossing the Line' Festival Announces Fall Lineup
headline.print_headline: French Cultural Center Sets Festival Plans
